org.tal.redstonechips.circuit
Interface CircuitIndex

All Known Implementing Classes:
CircuitLibrary
public interface CircuitIndex

An interface that enables a circuit library to inform RedstoneChips of all the Circuit classes it provides.

Author:
Tal Eisenberg

Method Summary
 Class<? extends Circuit>[] getCircuitClasses()
          Called by the RedstoneChips plugin.
 String getName()
           
 String getVersion()
           
 void onRedstoneChipsEnable(RedstoneChips instance)
          Called by the RedstoneChips plugin before starting to load circuit classes.
 

Method Detail

getCircuitClasses

Class<? extends Circuit>[] getCircuitClasses()
Called by the RedstoneChips plugin. Every circuit class in the class array is added to the circuit class pool.

Returns:
An array of Class objects. Each class must extend the Circuit class.

onRedstoneChipsEnable

void onRedstoneChipsEnable(RedstoneChips instance)
Called by the RedstoneChips plugin before starting to load circuit classes.

getName

String getName()
Returns:
the index name

getVersion

String getVersion()
Returns:
the index version
